item.title: Annie's Loft & Studio At Waipara River Estate
item.desc:
Luxury, private, B&B accommodation in historic homestead & charming gardens at Waipara River Estate, the oldest vineyard (formerly Glenmark) in Waipara.
Enjoy our premium boutique wines, including award winning Riesling & Pinot Noir - in the heart of Waipara.
